definition[0]: to go straight forward or continue in the same direction
example[0]: Just follow your nose until you come to a small bridge.
definition[1]: to go to the place from where there is a particular smell coming
example[1]: I followed my nose to the kitchen, where Marcie was making coffee.
definition[2]: to do something in the way that you feel is right
example[2]: After a few years in the detective game, you learn to follow your nose.
